entry.title: Categorizing Tweets using Machine Learning
entry.summary:
Description

This talk is suitable for new programmers as well as data scientists who are new to supervised learning. Check out the code for this talk on my GitHub profile to see if you'll find it interesting: github.com/halidebey/PyCon2018

We'll be working with a dataset of tweets and aiming to accurately categorize each tweet as relevant or irrelevant for the police using Machine Learning.

As I'm going through a live demo of the data cleaning process & analysis, I will (quickly) cover some machine learning concepts. To make the talk a bit more interactive, I recommend that attendees come with their (charged) laptops and go through the code during the talk.
